alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Mobile Central (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 11:14AM CST until March 03 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding. * WHERE...Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Lowest portions of the US 90/98 Causeway at the I-10 Interchange will likely observe splashover and standing water resulting in minor coastal flooding around the eastbound I-10 on- ramps. Additionally, the US 90/98 Causeway usually remains open in minor coastal flooding, but brief closures of the eastbound, outside lane are possible due to standing water and debris on the road is possible.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
